dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint]
dmca.body:
T

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, March 12, 2006 6:16 PM
To: partner@testking.net; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint
Date:         Sat, 11 Mar 2006 19:20:32 +0500
From:         Test King <partner@testking.net>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         legal-response@theplanet.com







March 11,2006

* *

*The Planet*

*1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suie 110*

*Dalla** , TX 75207***

*United States of America***

*Fax 214 782-7898*

* *

* *

*Sub:*  Copyrights /Infringement / DMCA Notification



We would like to inform you that one of your client *testkingcert.com* is
using our registered trade mark, logo, color scheme and reselling our study
materials in shape of electronic publications. It is harmful for our
business. It is a case of copyrights /infringements.



Our particulars are given below for your consideration and action.



01:   our website name        :     http://wwww.Testking.net
<http://wwww.testking.net/>

02:   Contact Information     :     104 N Model Town,Lahore

                                    Pakistan, partner@testking.net
<mailto:partner@testking.net>

                                    info@testking.net
<mailto:info@testking.net>



03:   Copyright Certificate #:      14778 (legal certificate attached)

04:   Work entitled     :           "Test King"

05:   Registration Country    :     Pakistan



Please deactivate wwww.testkingcert.com domain from your web server
otherwise, we will launch a complaint to your upstream to stop your IP
block.



Best Regards,





Atif Hameed

Executive Director

104 N Model Town

Lahore, Punjab, 54000

Pakistan.

partner@testking.net <mailto:partner@testking.net>

info@testking.net <mailto:info@testking.net>










104 N, Model Town Ext. Lahore 54000. Pakistan. Ph: +92(42) 5203501-4
Fax: +92(42) 5162298  Website:  www.testking.net  E-mail: info@testking.net




--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
